name: The Creature (BeastieBaiter, Space_Shoe, LibreTen)
description:
Play as The Creature, in a stealth game where you have to steal the items around the human population. 

Master his unique anatomy and skills and find out what are his motives!

Controls:
  • WASD to move around
  • Hold Right click do rotate camera
  • Space to switch between movesets
  • E & Q to raise and lower on secondary moveset
  • Alt-F4 to exit
Credits:
  • Guilherme "LibreTen" Carvalho - Programming, Animation
  • Manuel Menezes - Modeling, Art, Animation
  • João "Beastie Baiter" Pamplona - Modeling, Lighting, Sound

Ambient Sound Effect - http://bitly.ws/qu92

Wave Sound Effect - http://bitly.ws/qu8Y

We are part of a college game dev group - GameDev Técnico. You can find us at itch.io, facebook and twitter!
